Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_BUNDLE_IS_ALERT
    As of 0.14.0, replaced by CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_BUNDLE_SOURCE and CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_SOURCE_ALERT. While this constant was just introduce the key it references has been in use for several versions. However, it will be removed in the next major release in favor of the more flexible source.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_BUNDLE_IS_NOTIFICATION
    As of 0.14.0, replaced by CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_BUNDLE_SOURCE and CampaignNotificationBuilder.INTENT_SOURCE_NOTIFICATION. While this constant was just introduce the key it references has been in use for several versions. However, it will be removed in the next major release in favor of the more flexible source.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Campaign.checkIsConnectedToRedemptionPlace(String)
    Not for public use. As of 0.14.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.clearPartnerIdentifier()
    As of 0.6.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didDetermineStateForGeofence(int, ProximityKitGeofenceRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didDetermineStateForRegion(int, ProximityKitBeaconRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didEnterGeofence(ProximityKitGeofenceRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didEnterRegion(ProximityKitBeaconRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didExitGeofence(ProximityKitGeofenceRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didExitRegion(ProximityKitBeaconRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didFailSync(Exception)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didRangeBeaconsInRegion(Collection, ProximityKitBeaconRegion)
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.didSync()
    Not for public use. As of 0.12.0, no replacement.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getAllCampaigns()
    As of 0.1.3, replaced by CampaignKitManager.getFoundCampaigns().
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getAnalyticsURL()
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getAuthToken()
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getCampaignMap()
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Campaign.getIdAsInt()
    As of 0.15.0 no replacement; use Campaign.getId(). This will be removed in the next major release.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getInstance()
    Not for public use. As of 0.6.0, replaced by CampaignKitManager.getInstance(Context, Configuration).
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.getInstanceForApplication(Context)
    As of 0.6.0, replaced by CampaignKitManager.getInstance(Context, Configuration).
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.pruneAndReturnExpiredCampaigns()
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.setCampaignMap(Map)
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.setPartnerIdentifier(String)
    As of 0.6.0, replaced by CampaignKitManager.getInstance(Context, Configuration). Provide the identifier as part of the configuration.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager.setTriggeredCampaigns(Collection)
    Not for public use - no replacement. As of 0.6.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Campaign.updateCampaign(Campaign)
    Not for public use. As of 0.14.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.CampaignKitManager(Context)
    Not for public use. As of 0.6.0, replaced by CampaignKitManager.getInstance(Context, Configuration).
